question: Who appointed Harlan Fiske Stone to the Supreme Court?
answer: President Franklin D. Roosevelt did not appoint Harlan Fiske Stone to the Supreme Court, but rather he was appointed Chief Justice by him. He was initially appointed to the Supreme Court in 1925 by President Calvin Coolidge.
